{{title|swap{{dsc small|(std::copyable_function)}}}}
{{cpp/utility/functional/copyable_function/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++26|
friend void swap( std::copyable_function&amp; lhs, std::copyable_function&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}

Overloads the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::copyable_function}}. Exchanges the state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|std::copyable_function&lt;FunctionType&gt;}}}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|{{tt|std::copyable_function}} objects whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
